uhugo.install¶

uhugo.install.install_hugo(extract_from: str, os_type: str = 'Linux', move_to: str = '/home/akshay/bin') → str[source]¶

Installs the hugo binary at a given path

Parameters:

  • extract_from – The path zip/tar file downloaded

  • os_type – Type of OS - Windows, Darwin or posix.

  • move_to – Instillation location. Defaults to bin_folder()

Returns:

Installation path
